Un gran juego que todo el mundo debería jugar, no se hace aburrido tras unas horas, engancha, tanto su historia (que tampoco es para tanto, según mi opinión) como la jugabilidad. Sin duda tenéis que comprarlo.

話題なのでPortal１と２がセットになったバンドルを購入。
ポータルガンを使って、解き進めていくパズルFPSです。
やってみた感想としては、言葉では言い表しにくい新感覚・・・でしょうか。
今までとは一味（それ以上かもしれない）違ったゲームです。
ただゴールに向かうだけでなく、アイテムを活用して進んでいったり、ポータルガンを駆使したりもします。
Steam実績とSteamクラウド、ゲーム内でのオートセーブがあります。（手動でセーブもできますが）
セール中ならそのうちに買ってしまいましょう。

P.S 
これは人によっては酔うので、DEMO版をプレイしてから購入しましょう。
普通の３Dゲームは大丈夫という人でも、視点がグルンと変わったりするので、そういう人でもチェックはしておくこと必須です。
DEMO版はある程度のところまで製品版と同じプレイが可能です。

PP.S
ちなみにレビュー主は酔いませんでしたが頭が疲れました。
やはりDEMO版での酔わないかのチェックは大事です。

Отличная игра, созданная словно в форме маленького рассказа. Краткая, но интересная история, замечательный геймплей с необычными головоломками, где нужно не только догадаться, чего от вас хочет геймдизайнер, но и экспериментировать. И пусть сейчас первая часть находится несколько в тени своего прекрасного сиквела, в неё до сих пор интересно играть. Редко ставлю такие оценки играм, но - 9/10. 

А тортик - это ложь.

Un ottimo passatempo e rompicapo. Pur non essendo un gioco di lotta o avventura o simili, è molto carino. Molto bello anche cimentarsi nel completarlo a difficoltà più elevate. Possiamo dire che sia un gioco privo di storia e che dopo averlo completato una volta non lo toccherete più per parecchio tempo, ma tuttto sommato, non è male.
Порталы порталами, а тортик по расписанию.

highly recommend for anyone looking for a strategic gae with a good storyline. cant wait to get into portal 2!

Portal is one of the most quintessential games on Steam. From the beginning of the game to the very last cutscene, the game is steeped in a fascinating atmosphere. You wake up in the mysterious Aperture Laboratories testing facility, being spoken to by an unseen robotic voice who guides you through the various testing chambers of the facility. You'll quickly notice, of course, that she's far from an uninteresting character.

Early on, you are given a Portal Gun, which is the game's primary puzzle mechanic. With this tool, you're able to create two portals on most surfaces which you can step through. This opens up a huge variety of puzzles, which the game quite adequately explores.

There are a few other notable items at your disposal, notably the Companion Cube (and movable cubes in general) which also greatly assist the gameplay. You'll also find a number of secrets hidden around the many levels, contributing to the atmosphere and your understanding of the universe that the game has crafted.

The controls are quite simple, and the graphics hold up fine today. The soundtrack on its own isn't anything special, but the way it changes based on your actions and environment is very fitting. Portal was probably one of the most influential puzzle games ever created; countless games have taken inspiration from it since its release. While it's a short game overall, it's definitely worth playing through.
Grandísimo juego.

bueno ya e terminado portal 3 veces y hecho una gran cantidad de logros asi que creo que ya es momento de hacer un análisis bueno portal es un juego de rompecabezas en el que usas una pistola de portales que al principio solo reciviras el portal azul pero al avanzar te daran el portal naranja cada vez que avanzes en el juego los rompecabezas seran mas dificiles y sera mas facil que mueras ademas que tendras varias veces que usar objetos que te da el mapa como por ejemplo los cubos que vas a estar utilizandos varias veces tambien te encontraras con enemigos que vienen siendo las torretas el juego tambien tiene un modo de mapas avanzados que consiste en los mapas de una partida normal pero con ligeros cambios que pueden hacer que sean un dolor de cabeza como hacer que no puedas destruir las torretas o que en varias zonas no puedas poner portales tambien esta el modo de jugar contra el tiempo en el que tendras que terminar un mapa en el menor tiempo posible honestamente creo que este es uno de los mejores juego de valve muy diferente a otros juegos que la compañia a creado este juego te obliga a pensar antes de actuar, si es que no quieres morir, recomiendo este juego por completo si te gusta poner a prueba tu cerebro

Portal is one of those games you should play at least once, it's inexpensive but will still give you a solid 20 hours of gameplay and is good for a couple play throughs, plus if you get the second one there are multiplayer options.

Portal is a 3D, first person puzzle game, that is comical, easy to play, and just challenging enough that it can accomdate any kind of gamer. 

The humor is a bit dry but hard to miss. The violence is cartoonish as there is no blood or gore, only some shooting, and only little robots shoot you, which you disable with a "portal gun" in very creative ways. Without spoiling it, suffice to say there is enough to feel a sense of danger, but other than that it's totally exploration and not threatening at all. The puzzles are not infuriating, so even if that's not your thing you should enjoy this game! Nice controls and graphics also. The second one is even better than the first, I highly recommend them both.

If you're wondering whether it's worth getting portal 1 or better to just get portal 2 it is. If you get it in a bundle you can essentially get it for the price of a doughnut. 
It's about 4 hours which although not long again if you get it in a bundle it's so cheap it doesn't matter. This game is good quality.
This game doesn't have as many mechanics or as good story telling as portal 2 but again it's still worth it. 
This game is worth it for at least the unique puzzles alone and a bit of backstory to how portal 2 came to place. The puzzles learning curve may not be as good as portal 2 but it's still decent. It's nice to understand how the mechanics and setting for portal 2 originated in my opinion.

Un giochino puzzle molto carino, ha delle meccaniche interessantissime, però è troppo breve, persino per un gioco puzzle.

Pro:
- meccaniche fantastiche, sfruttare i portali per interagire in ogni modo con l'ambiente (es. butta un oggetto nel portale per trasferirlo, fai passare i razzi nemici nel portale per aprirti la strada) è la base del gioco
- non particolarmente complesso, un pizzico di cervello e un po' di pazienza bastano

Contro:
- troppo breve (meno di 3 ore)

Tutto sommato, data la durata, lo consiglierei a tutti i giocatori, anche a quelli non particolarmente pazienti.

Something about cake.

I played Portal back when it came out almost 10 years ago. This game has aged really well. I loved the game then, and I feel the same now; it still has its simple charm, and the puzzles range from very easy to pleasantly tricky. I know some people knock this game for its length, but I think its short duration makes it easy for anybody to jump in and enjoy. This game has a little replay value... probably 4 times or so before it gets old. The challenges add the most value to this game, and I don't think too many people have actually beaten ALL of the challenges. 

Simply put, Portal is easily a classic game that can be played by gamers of all ages.
